sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: select account_id as codigo ,name as cuenta ,round(sum(debe),2) as valor ,'2' as typeheader from ( select a.id, ev.value as account_id, name as name, a.initialamt as SALDO_INICIAL, a.amtacctdr as debe , a.amtacctcr as haber, A.INITIALAMT+A.AMTACCTDR-A.AMTACCTCR AS SALDO_FINAL from( SELECT sum(case when (DATEACCT < TO_DATE(':p_df') or (DATEACCT = TO_DATE(':p_df') and F.FACTACCTTYPE = 'O')) then F.AMTACCTDR - F.AMTACCTCR else 0 end) as initialamt, sum(case when (DATEACCT >= TO_DATE(':p_df') AND F.FACTACCTTYPE not in('O', 'R', 'C')) or (DATEACCT = TO_DATE(':p_df') and F.FACTACCTTYPE = NULL) then F.AMTACCTDR else 0 end) as AMTACCTDR, sum(case when (DATEACCT >= TO_DATE(':p_df') AND F.FACTACCTTYPE not in('O', 'R', 'C')) or (DATEACCT = TO_DATE(':p_df') and F.FACTACCTTYPE = NULL) then F.AMTACCTCR else 0 end) as AMTACCTCR, F.ACCOUNT_ID AS ID, to_char('') AS groupbyid FROM FACT_ACCT F WHERE date(DATEACCT) <= TO_DATE(':p_dt') AND F.ISACTIVE='Y' and (f.ad_org_id = ':p_adorg' OR COALESCE(':p_adorg','ND')='ND') group by F.ACCOUNT_ID ) a, c_elementvalue ev where a.id = ev.c_elementvalue_id and ev.elementlevel = 'S' and EV.VALUE in (:p_account) and (a.initialamt <>0 or a.amtacctcr <>0 or a.amtacctdr<>0) order by ev.value, ev.name, id ) rep group by name, account_id

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.name: Espacio en blanco
sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: select null as codigo ,' ' as cuenta ,null as valor ,'ES' as typeheader from dual

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.name: Titulo 1

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: select codigo, cuenta, case when valor<>0 then ((valor*22)/100) else 0 end as valor,typeheader from ( select '6.1.02' as codigo,'Impuesto a la renta del ejercicio' as cuenta,coalesce(:p_amount,0) as valor , '2' as typeheader from dual ) rep

select codigo, cuenta, case when valor<>0 then ((valor*15)/100) else 0 end as valor,typeheader from (select '6.2.01' as codigo,'Participaci√≥n Laboral' as cuenta,coalesce(:p_amount,0) as valor , '2' as typeheader from dual ) rep

select account_id as codigo ,name as cuenta ,round(sum(debe),2) as valor ,'2' as typeheader from ( select a.id, ev.value as account_id, name as name, a.initialamt as SALDO_INICIAL, a.amtacctdr as debe , a.amtacctcr as haber, A.INITIALAMT+A.AMTACCTDR-A.AMTACCTCR AS SALDO_FINAL from( SELECT sum(case when (DATEACCT < TO_DATE(':p_df') or (DATEACCT = TO_DATE(':p_df') and F.FACTACCTTYPE = 'O')) then F.AMTACCTDR - F.AMTACCTCR else 0 end) as initialamt, sum(case when (DATEACCT >= TO_DATE(':p_df') AND F.FACTACCTTYPE not in('O', 'R', 'C')) or (DATEACCT = TO_DATE(':p_df') and F.FACTACCTTYPE = NULL) then F.AMTACCTDR else 0 end) as AMTACCTDR, sum(case when (DATEACCT >= TO_DATE(':p_df') AND F.FACTACCTTYPE not in('O', 'R', 'C')) or (DATEACCT = TO_DATE(':p_df') and F.FACTACCTTYPE = NULL) then F.AMTACCTCR else 0 end) as AMTACCTCR, F.ACCOUNT_ID AS ID, to_char('') AS groupbyid FROM FACT_ACCT F WHERE date(DATEACCT) <= TO_DATE(':p_dt') AND F.ISACTIVE='Y' and (f.ad_org_id = ':p_adorg' OR COALESCE(':p_adorg','ND')='ND') group by F.ACCOUNT_ID ) a, c_elementvalue ev where a.id = ev.c_elementvalue_id and ev.elementlevel = 'S' and EV.VALUE in (:p_account) and (a.initialamt <>0 or a.amtacctcr <>0 or a.amtacctdr<>0) union all select '' as id_, ev.value as account_id, ev.name as name, 0 as SALDO_INICIAL,0 as debe ,0 as haber, 0 AS SALDO_FINAL from c_elementvalue ev where EV.VALUE in (:p_account) order by 2,1 ) rep group by name, account_id

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.name: Espacio en blanco
sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: select null as codigo ,' ' as cuenta ,null as valor ,'ES' as typeheader from dual

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.name: tITULO2
sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: SELECT null as codigo ,'COMPONENTES DE RESULTADOS INTEGRALES' as cuenta ,SUM(VALOR) AS valor ,'1' as typeheader from ( :p_group1 ) REP

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.name: Espacio en blanco
sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: select null as codigo ,' ' as cuenta ,null as valor ,'ES' as typeheader from dual

sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.name: Titulo3
sfcbr_inc_statmnt_script.rEPSql: SELECT null as codigo ,'UTILIDAD INTEGRAL DEL PERIODO' as cuenta ,SUM(VALOR) AS valor ,'1' as typeheader from ( select null as codigo,'UTILIDAD INTEGRAL DEL PERIODO' as cuenta, :p_amount as valor , '1' as typeheader from dual union all :p_group1 ) REP
